name: Unholy Angel
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2248580/Lovely_Crush/

Game Introduction

In this game you will meet 10 incredibly beautiful girls.
They will talk about who they are and what they are passionate about.
Each of which will give you the opportunity to go through several puzzle levels to test you and your mind.
Each girl will have 4 level to play

so relax, sit back and enjoy the game

FEATURES

  • 40 levels of relaxed puzzle game
  • 10 charming girls
  • relaxing music
  • High quality art

Thank you all for your support of Kawaii Hentai.
